MonsterStat
maxhp

word : maximum Health Points

hp

word : Health Points

atk

word : ATacK points

def

word : DEFense points

xp

word : number of XP given if defeated

gold

word : number of gold given

item

byte : ID of the item given if lucky

itemchance

byte : chance of obtaining the item (0 = 0%, 255 = 100%)

size: 16 bytes

Constants
MONSTER_STAT_SHIFT

size of struct MonsterStat in power of 2
